#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()

{
std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

int T;
cin>>T;

while(T--)
{
int N;
cin>>N;

int i, A[N], count=0;
for(i=0; i<N; i++)
{
cin>>A[i];
if(A[i]>=i+1)
count+=int(A[i]/(i+1));
}

if(count%2==1)
cout<<"ALICE";

else
cout<<"BOB";

cout<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
